text: hi I am having a sales hub pro subscription and trying to do this. We have a meeting scheduler meeting created and embedded on to our company website. So when clicked the link it will redirect to HubSpot meeting scheduler link and once the meeting is submitted will show the thanking message. Instead of this we wanted it redirected to our own website with the thank you landing page. So we inserted the link to the redirected to external url on the advanced settings of the form. But we want the redirection link to pass in the event confirmation info as well so we can display that display on our landing page for the client. So we tried creating a sample link with query selector <https://samplewebsite.com/thankyou-HubSpot/?event_type_name=EVENT_NAME&invitee_first[…]t_start_time=EVENT_START_TIME&event_end_time=EVENT_END_TIME|https://weareteamrocket.com/thankyou-HubSpot/?event_type_name=EVENT_NAME&invitee_first[…]t_start_time=EVENT_START_TIME&event_end_time=EVENT_END_TIME> but the query fields are not working how can I find the correct fields and get this sorted. And whether this is possible with the current subscription and all that.

When working tickets in HubSpot and choosing to send an email out. HubSpot is asking me to connect to my inbox. I don't want my emails in HubSpot. I want to be able to send an email on a ticket and then when the end user (staff) responds I want it tied to the ticket as well as I get notified that the ticket was updated with an email. Is this possible?

Yes the script could be used with any page

Hi. PSA/request for more info.

We’re beta testing our new website and found that CTAs and at least one module simply aren’t showing up in Firefox by default. If we add the site to a tracking exception list, in Firefox settings, they show up fine which seem to imply it is a privacy issue? Seems like a huge deal. Anyone have any suggestions or solutions? Thanks!

If this is the wrong place to post this please correct me.

I have a custom object that I need to change the Default's View order of the properties being shown.  However it seems every time I make a change it's not working.
Is it possible to change the Default View Property Order?
I need some help understanding what I am doing wrong and how I can fix this.

Hey all, has anyone had any luck getting conversion rates using formula function fields in reports? The formulas I've built so far haven't yielded anything except 0%. The report displays the assigned user and the count of custom objects (sales, appointments) where they are assigned. The idea would be to see the conversion rate of # of appointments to sales for each assigned user.

Hey Tony, did you ever customize your personal view for the custom object before changing the default view? It's "Customize Properties" under the actions menu in the record view. I think if you change the default view for a record but already have a customized property view, it won't change it so you can keep your personalized sidebar.
Is your email connected under your HubSpot user profile? or connected under the inbox?
Hello, everyone, My name is Martin and I am a full-stack developer with rich experience of HubSpot.
